item.title: Maxims for Thinking Analytically
item.description: Maxims for Thinking Analytically When you are having trouble getting your thinking straight, go to the extreme case Helpful in the following situations To undestand a concept, problem, or idea Identify outliers To assess the best-case or worst-case consequences of a decision Stress test provides a sense of security - if you could pass it When you are having trouble getting your thinking straight, go to a simple case “Everyhing should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler” Einstein Don’t take refuge in complexity Are you hiding in complexity to prevent yourself from answering critical questions?
